name: Monika Weiss
caption: Phlegethon-Milczenie (2005). Self-shot photography, performance, books, projected video, sound. Collection: Cisneros Fontanals Art Foundation, Miami.
summary: Monika Weiss (born 1964, Warsaw) is a Polish-American contemporary artist based in New York City. She works primarily with Installation, video projection, performance, sound and drawing. Her transdisciplinary approach investigates relationships between body and history, and evokes ancient rituals of lamentation.
